listings.name: Mountain-Man Jerky
listings.description: this jerky is hand-made by Greg, using select cuts of steak, and marinated for 3 weeks prior prior to smoking.

listings.name: Smoked Bacon
listings.description: This bacon is cooked by smoking it on a outdoor smoker for multiple days, after a 2-week curing process. Hand-crafted in small batches to perfection!

listings.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
listings.description: These cookies are made by Greg's wife: Wendy, and are delicous and healthy. A real treat.

listings.name: Greg's Coffee Beans
listings.description: These beans are bought-locally, and roasted to perfection using a decades-old technique passed down from Greg's father to Greg. If you are looking for a quick pick-me-up add these delicous beans to your cart.

listings.name: Trail Mix
listings.description: AKA GORP (granola, oatmeal, raisin, peanuts) is a must-have for day-hikes, camping trips, and just those looking for a little bit of extra engergy. Made from local ingredients.

listings.name: Smoked Salmon
listings.description: This smoked salmon is caught locally in Portland, on the Willamette River, and smoked to perfection with a medley of flavors and spices.
